title: I am in the first year of graduation. How should I prepare for the SSC CGLE? - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam

response.answer_text: Shubham , Enjoy your college life first , Explore your interests your hobbies , your passion as this is the ideal time. Trust me SSC doesn't worth all that we usually give it . You should start your preparations once you enter prefinal year of your Graduation. Pace it to its max in the last year be done with it by the end of your college. And remember , make your first attempt the last one , otherwise you will be trapped in SSC's vicious circle. Take things lightly but confidently.

First a fall if you are biggener ,you shoud get whole details of your syllabus through YouTube that is better and then you take subscription of cgl course any app like- unacademy, carrier will, apptrix etc..I prefer unacademy..and takes class..do self study because you have enough time you can read 4–5 hr maxm because interest has been continuous..
